posts.post_title: FS 8 Different Ungraded T205s, Chance, McGraw
posts.post_content:
Hello Everyone,

I have these 8 different T205s for sale. Chance has some staining on the reverse. McGraw is heavily creased. Hoffman has a few surface wrinkles, the rest of the cards are crease free. Decent centering. Priced as marked. 

OPEN FOR OFFERS ON THE REMAINING FOUR CARDS. 

[STRIKE]Chance, Frank, Piedmont, $150.00 [/STRIKE]Sold
McGraw, John, Polar Bear, $75.00
[STRIKE]Elberfeld, Kid, Piedmont,[/STRIKE] Sold
[STRIKE]O’Leary, Charles, Piedmont, $45.00[/STRIKE] Sold
[STRIKE]Stone, George, Hassan, $35.00[/STRIKE] SOLD
[STRIKE]Graham, George, [/STRIKE]Piedmont, sold
[STRIKE]Hoffman, Dan, Polar Bear, $40.00[/STRIKE] Sold

Payment: Paypal (F/F), check, or money order are all acceptable.

First response with a commitment to purchase gets the card(s).

Thanks for looking,

Joe
Bump. Open to offers on the remaining 4 cards. Thanks, Joe
